thread.title: Shoe hurled at Ajay Devgn while the Singham hero was campaigning for BJP in Bihar!
thread.title_full: Shoe hurled at Ajay Devgn while the Singham hero was campaigning for BJP in Bihar!

author: Prathamesh Jadhav | India.com Entertainment Desk
title: Shoe hurled at Ajay Devgn while the Singham hero was campaigning for BJP in Bihar!
text:
Shoe hurled at Ajay Devgn while the Singham hero was campaigning for BJP in Bihar! By India.com Entertainment Desk on October 10, 2015 at 6:15 PM Comments 
When Ajay Devgn made his presence felt while campaigning for BJP in Bihar, an untoward incident happened. The Singham actor was in Lakhisari to vouch for the party he supports for the forthcoming Bihar elections. Soon the word spread out and Ajay was spotted in a vehicle with BJP workers. He was seen waving at the crowd. Just when things look fine crowd started gathering to have a glimpse of their favourite superstar. ALSO READ: OMG! Ajay Devgn & Kajol’s video goes viral on porn site! 
In this video you will see crowd swelling. People climbed on the nearby building and trees to get a glimpse of the actor. Soon after that things started going out of control. That’s when someone threw a chappal at the superstar. This video captured by Star News will show how the superstar missed the shoe attack aimed at him. Thankfully Ajay was quickly whisked off the site after the shameful occurrence. Take a look at the video and tell us hwat do you have to say about this incident. 
  6:18 PM Topics:
